channel.title: Item on object?

item.title: Item on object?
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Make sure the object and item Ids are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Item on object?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Ferity, post:2, topic:377856”] if(UsedOnObjectID == 4111 && ItemID == 5585){ deleteItem(5585, 1); addItem(Item.randomAvatarMini(), 1); sM("You search the chest, and successfully find a item!"); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 4111 && ItemID != 5585){ sM("You need a bronze key before you can open the chest."); } [/quote]

Make sure that code is under your item on object packet though; it won’t work just anywhere is what I’m saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Item on object?
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Like you coded it, you have to click on the object to recieve the reward
Change it to

if(UsedOnObjectID == 4111 && ItemID == 5585){
deleteItem(5585, 1);
addItem(Item.randomAvatarMini(), 1);
sM("You search the chest, and successfully find a item!");
}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 4111 && ItemID != 5585){
sM("You need a bronze key before you can open the chest.");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Item on object?
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

Under public class Item { in ‘Item.java’ I have:

[code]public static int AvatarMini[] = {4214,6889,6527,6522,6523,6524,6525,6526,685,687,4225,3839,3841,3843,4151,8002,35,667,2402,746,537,9003,8001,7809,7808,7807,7806,592};

public static int randomAvatarMini()
{
return AvatarMini[(int)(Math.random()*AvatarMini.length)];
}[/code]

In ‘Client.java’ I have:

if(objectID == 4111){ if(playerHasItem(5585)) { deleteItem(5585, 1); addItem(Item.randomAvatarMini(), 1); sM("You search the chest, and successfully find a item!"); } else sM("You need a bronze key before you can open the chest."); } }

I use the key on the chest nothing works, same with just clicking the chest itsself.
Any idea’s?

Read full topic
